titles: A pleasant ballad of Tobias, wherein is shewed what wonderful things chanced to him in his youth, and how he wedded a young damsel that had had several husbands, but never enjoyed their company, being all slain by an evil spirit. To a pleasant new tune.
publisher: Printed by and for A. M. and sold by the booksellers of London.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
